pages.text: The Receiver is a block which, when a Switchboard is inserted, can receive notes from a Linked Transmitter within range (16 blocks) and output a redstone signal if the note matches the configured filter criteria.

pages.title: Receiver GUI
pages.text: Right clicking on a placed Receiver allows you to open the Receiver GUI and insert a Switchboard into the Switchboard slot. When a Switchboard is inserted you can configure the Switchboard properties using the GUI.

pages.title: Switchboard Properties
pages.text: Receivers use the following $(l:switchboard_properties)Switchboard Properties$():$(br2)- Linked Transmitter$(br)- MIDI Channels$(br)- Filter Note
